originalText.text:
This company doesn’t have any experience in security of big buildings
No uniforms, no trained people, is not a good company for security in our premises
Maybe they’re good for private parties or night clubs
I hope they’ll hire people with experience, good presence and good manners to treat residents in our buildings

originalText.text: I used Montro Protection for a private event with 500 guests. The owner, Justin, helped me build a custom package to cover my event safely and efficiently. The guards showed up on time, and dressed very sharply. My guests were impressed with their professionalism. Will definitely use again!!!

The guards showed up on time, and dressed very sharply. My guests were impressed with their professionalism. Will definitely use again!!!

originalText.text: Montro Protection is a fair and equal opportunity company  and great company to work for. Theres great communication with the management team,  the staff and employees always comes first, and theres multiple opportunities for growth and career expansion. Montro takes care of patrons, clients and their employees. I love working for this company !!
